chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Caraline Damodred, p. 27 (19)—Cairhienin noble vying for the Sun Throne in Cairhien; she is related to Laman, the last king from House Damodred. She is in league with High Lord Darlin of Tear and Toram Riatin of Cairhien in opposition to Rand. She bears a strong resemblance to her cousin, Moiraine. See also Damodred, Moiraine; Riatin, Toram; Sisnera, Darlin.
